name: Inventory Source
tag_list: wholesale, dropship, supply-chain-management, dropshipping, enterprise-software, supply-chain, product-data, product-automation, product-feed, product-feed-automation, automated-product-import, dropship-suppliers, wholesale-product-source, wholesale-direc
overview:
Inventory Source is a wholesale dropship inventory management solution provider for online resellers. Inventory Source acts as the “plug-in” IT Department for supply chain management services for the ecommerce store owner while managing their multi-supplier to multi-sales channel data transactions.

The data solution allows the inventory growth engine to integrate with any wholesale supplier catalog. This is done without an API limitation, as all integrations are done directly to the product sources’ own inventory EDI configuration. The data is captured and imported into the proprietary “IS Simple Specification” format for product data. This allows InventorySource.com to map the data into any ecommerce import structure from any wholesale distributor.

On the retail side, Inventory Source has integrations with a growing list of shopping cart platforms (ie 3dCart, Shopify, Big Commerce, Magento, MagentoGO, Virtuemart, Zen Cart, Open Cart, Presta Shop, eBay ProStores, and more), as well as marketplaces like Amazon, eBay, Overstock, Price Grabber, etc.

Between the supplier source and the sales channel, the Inventory Source system provides a GUI with push button controls. They allow the store owner to control category formats, price settings, product and brand filters and more. A store owner or marketplace seller can control their inventory updates to the exact format they need. Inventory Source then automatically loads the products and images and updates changes in price, quantity, and status for the retail catalog without any technical data management or code changes needed by the store owner.

Along with the full automation services for wholesale dropship product data management, Inventory Source can add additional custom feeds for the inventory in any CSV, TXT, or XML format allowing imports for custom platforms, non-integrated stores, or any marketplace import requirement.

It is a full end to end inventory management solution, giving small and medium sized companies the technical capability of a large store or marketplace provider.
